mapper.select: select sub1.cust_id as custId ,sub1.center_nm as centerNm ,sub1.out_ord_dt as outOrdDt ,sub1.code_name ,count(sub1.id) as countUnFinishedOut from (select oi.id ,om.cust_id ,mc.center_nm ,count(ori.id) as parcel_count ,om.out_method ,ccd.code_name ,om.out_stats ,om.out_ord_dt from cwt_out_info oi join cwt_out_ord_mst om on om.id = oi.mst_id and om.use_yn ='Y' join cwt_mst_center mc on mc.id = om.cust_id join cwt_code_dtl ccd on ccd.code_id = om.out_method and ccd.use_yn ='Y' and ccd.code_group_id = 'ORD_METHOD_TYPE' left join cwt_rel_info_invc ori on ori.info_id = oi.id and ori.use_yn ='Y' and ori.rel_stats ='CN' where 1=1 and date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') > om.out_ord_dt and oi.use_yn ='Y' and om.out_type !='OTAD' and om.out_stats not in ('OS05', 'OS99') group by oi.id order by om.out_ord_dt desc) sub1 where 1=1 and ((sub1.out_method = 'PC' and 1 > sub1.parcel_count) or (sub1.out_method != 'PC')) group by sub1.cust_id, sub1.out_ord_dt, sub1.out_method order by sub1.out_ord_dt
mapper.insert: /*TestInsertMapper.insertInOrdNotificationInfo*/ insert cwt_notification_info ( cust_id, type_cd, content, create_dt, reg_date, mod_date ) values ( #{notificationInfoVO.custId}, #{notificationInfoVO.typeCd}, #{notificationInfoVO.content}, now(), now(), now() )
mapper.select: select ni.id from cwt_notification_info as ni left join (select id, info_id from cwt_ad_notification where ad_mid = #{adNotificationVO.adMid}) as an on ni.id = an.info_id where an.info_id is null;
mapper.insert: insert into cwt_ad_notification (info_id, ad_mid, read_yn, reg_date, mod_date) values (#{adNotificationVO.infoId}, #{adNotificationVO.adMid}, 'N', now(), now());
mapper.select: select (select count(an.read_yn) from cwt_ad_notification as an join cwt_notification_info as ni on an.info_id = ni.id where type_cd='IN01' and ad_mid =#{adNotificationVO.adMid} and read_yn='N') as countInOrd , (select count(an.read_yn) from cwt_ad_notification as an join cwt_notification_info as ni on an.info_id = ni.id where type_cd='OS01' and ad_mid =#{adNotificationVO.adMid} and read_yn='N') as countOutOrd , (select count(an.read_yn) from cwt_ad_notification as an join cwt_notification_info as ni on an.info_id = ni.id where type_cd='UFOT' and ad_mid =#{adNotificationVO.adMid} and read_yn='N') as countUnFinishOut , (select count(an.read_yn) from cwt_ad_notification as an join cwt_notification_info as ni on an.info_id = ni.id where type_cd='JOIN' and ad_mid =#{adNotificationVO.adMid} and read_yn='N') as countJoin

select an.id as id, ni.create_dt as createDt, ni.content as content, an.read_yn as readYn, ni.type_cd as typeCd from cwt_ad_notification as an join cwt_notification_info as ni on an.info_id = ni.id where ad_mid =#{adNotificationVO.adMid} and ni.type_cd ='IN01' and ni.create_dt >=(CURDATE()-INTERVAL 10 DAY) order by ni.create_dt desc, an.read_yn desc, ni.id desc;
